DOC.brief_title: Persona Partial Knee Clinical Outcomes Study
DOC.detailed_description: The study design prospective , multicenter , noncontrolled study commercially available Persona Partial Knee . The study require site obtain IRB approval prior study enrollment . All potential study subject require participate Informed Consent Process . All study subject undergo preoperative clinical evaluation prior partial knee arthroplasty . Investigators collect clinical data require 2 year option continue follow-up assessment 10 year . Follow-up clinical visit include 3 month , 1 year , 2 , 5 , 10 year post-operatively . The primary objective study obtain implant survivorship clinical outcome data commercially available Persona Partial Knee System . The assessment include : implant survivorship base revision removal study device ; safety base incidence frequency adverse event ; clinical performance measure overall pain function , quality life data , radiographic parameter , survivorship .
